description:
Cozy jacket seeks fun guy for winter adventures and exploring the city. I enjoy long walks in the snow, drinking hot chocolate and ice skating. My friends say I'm cozy warm (but not Michelin Man–bulky) and great at fending off snow, rain and wind. I can't wait to meet you!

  • Made from Fjallraven's G-1000 Lite fabric, a super-durable and wind-resistant blend of recycled polyester and organically grown cotton with a dense weave
  • Impregnated with Fjallraven's Greenland wax treatment for excellent water resistance. To make it waterproof, apply additional wax (sold separately)
  • G-Loft Supreme recycled synthetic insulation uses hollow-fibre polyester clusters to trap warm air for cozy warmth
  • 2-way front zipper has a storm flap to seal out gusts
  • Handwarmer pockets, 2 chest pockets and 2 internal drop-in pockets carry your stuff
  • Oversized zipper pulls are easy to grab with gloves on
  • Cuffs have Velcro adjustments for easy on/off
name: Fjallraven Skogso Padded Jacket - Men's
